heroInfo.introduction: I'm Shivaan Sharma, A computer science engineer
heroInfo.description: A passionate BTech CSE student driven by innovation, exploring AI, compilers, and creative tech projects. Inspired by Tesla, building unique tools like a custom programming language and interactive web apps.

listOfAchievements.text: Received the Best Research Paper Award for significant contributions to artificial intelligence applications in education, with the research published in a renowned international journal.
Successfully completed the Stanford University Machine Learning Certification, gaining expertise in supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and AI-driven decision-making.
Invited as a keynote speaker at the National Education Summit, where I delivered a session on the impact of AI and big data in modern educational methodologies.
Honored with the Distinguished Professor Award by a prestigious university in recognition of excellence in research, teaching, and academic leadership.
Mentored over 50 Ph.D. and Master’s students, guiding research scholars in various domains including artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and blockchain applications.

projects.projectName: Data science internship at iit roorkee
projects.headline1: Currently pursuing a Data Science internship at IIT Roorkee, working on real-world data analysis, machine learning models, and research-based problem solving.
projects.skills: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Neural Networks, Research Methodologies, Data Science

projects.headline1: Currently working as a Next.js intern at Template Farm, building dynamic web applications, optimizing performance, and contributing to modern frontend development using React and Next.js.
projects.skills: Next.js 	•	React.js 	•	JavaScript (ES6+) 	•	Tailwind CSS 	•	HTML/CSS 	•	Git & GitHub 	•	API Integration 	•	Responsive Web Design 	•	Component-Based Architecture 	•	Performance Optimization

projects.projectName: FullStack developer intern at Tbi gehu
projects.headline1: worked as a Full Stack Developer Intern at TBI GEHU, developing and maintaining web applications using modern frontend and backend technologies for scalable and efficient solutions.

qualifications.courseName: Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Computer Science
qualifications.headline1: Conducted research on deep learning models for Indian language processing.
qualifications.headline2: Published multiple research papers in IEEE, Springer, and Scopus-indexed journals.

qualifications.courseName: Master of Technology (M.Tech.) in Computer Science
qualifications.headline1: Focused on large-scale cloud computing solutions for Indian enterprises.
qualifications.headline2: Published a thesis on optimizing AI-driven healthcare solutions.

qualifications.courseName: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) in Computer Science
qualifications.headline1: Developed an online examination system adopted by multiple universities.
qualifications.headline2: Represented India at the ACM ICPC World Finals.
